pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Top Casino Star Stage +44-17683-71638 topcasinostarstage@gmail.com Market St, Kirkby Stephen CA17 4QW, UK topcasinostarstage Home The best casinos Casino reviews Best deals Chanceful game Compare casino Privacy Policy Cookies and Other Tracking Technologies We use cookies and other tracking technologies to collect information about your device and browsing behavior when you visit our website. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow us to recognize your device and remember your preferences and settings when you return to our website. We use both session cookies, which are deleted when you close your browser, and persistent cookies, which remain on your device until you delete them or they expire. The information we collect through cookies and other tracking technologies may include your IP address, browser type, operating system, the pages you visit on our website, and the links you click on. We use this information to improve the functionality and performance of our website, to provide you with personalized content and recommendations, and to analyze trends and usage patterns. We may also use this information to serve you targeted advertisements based on your interests and browsing behavior. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies, or to notify you when a website sets a cookie on your device. However, please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality and performance of our website. Third-Party Links and Services Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by topcasinostarstage. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of these third-party websites or services. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of any third-party websites or services you visit or use. International Data Transfers topcasinostarstage is based in the United States, and your personal information may be transferred to and processed in the United States or other countries where our service providers are located. These countries may have data protection laws that are different from the laws of your country. However, we will take appropriate measures to ensure that your personal information is protected in accordance with this Privacy Policy and applicable law. Data Retention We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, to comply with our legal obligations, or to resolve disputes. The criteria we use to determine the retention period for your personal information may include the nature and sensitivity of the information, the purpose for which it was collected, and the applicable legal requirements.
